author: kwright
msg: Fix for CONNECTORS-245. Fix JSON output for job inspection for API.

author: simonetripodi
msg: used smarter ArrayList instead of continuous replaced fixed arrays
that modification introduces a Clirr error
"Changed type of field commands from org.apache.commons.chain.Command[] to java.util.List"
it was used anyway only as internal data structure to store Command instances & for test purposes, not a meaningful change

author: markt
msg: Fix a bug in eviction that could see a destroyed object returned to the idle object pool if:
- it was being validated by the evictor
- an attempt was made to borrow the object during validation
